description: Extends icarEventCoreResource to support event observations on groups of animals.

groupMethod.description: Indicates whether the event references an existing animal set, has an embedded animal set, or an inventory classification.

countObserved.description: Summarises the number of animals observed in the event. Generally the number of animals in the group, but sometimes a sample.

inventoryClassification.description: Describe the group of animals by their characteristics rather than animal identifiers.

embeddedAnimalSet.description: Specifies the set of animals as a list of member animal identifiers.

animalSetReference.description: Reference an existing animal set by ID and optionally URI
